title: How iPhone and Apple Watch can help protect you from hearing loss
content:
iPhone and Apple Watch include a wide range of valuable health features and a couple of them that don’t get much attention include measuring ambient and headphone noise levels. Read along for a look at how to protect from hearing loss by checking decibel levels on iPhone and Apple Watch.

more…

The post How iPhone and Apple Watch can help protect you from hearing loss appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: This detailed walkthrough covers how to check decibel levels on iPhone and Apple Watch to help prevent hearing loss and more.
